page.title: 17RECREATIONAL OPEN SPACE
page.content: Tourism is important in Ross,although local entertainment is limited. Its only cinema closed in March l985 due to lack of support.The swimming pool caters for 120000 people annually with 7 full &3 part time staff. It is open every day of the week, 9am -9pm.Scouts and Guides packs thrive (2Beaver,3 Cub 3 Scout,3 Brownie,3 Guides,l Ranger).A rifle and pistol club caters for 50+ & children.Woodville opened a Social Club in l973 offering skittle alley, pool & snooker tables.The only equip- ped park in the area is at Dean Hill catering for small children.Cycle and running races are organised through the towns streets annually. A central- ly positioned youth centre,about 20 years old,has a gym & offers football, volleyball,darts,pool & table tennis; also computer & television.Squash,mini golf & tennis available at Weston.
